skill.name: Sewing
skill.perk.level2: You can now sew trendy, sellable clothing with Emily's sewing machine.
skill.perk.level3: You can now find silkworms in the forest.
skill.perk.level6: You can now embroider clothing with colorful thread.
skill.perk.level8: You can now decorate embroidered clothing with gemstones.
skill.perk.level9: You can now dye cloth and yarn using the legendary dyes.
message.noMoreTailoring: Whew, that's the last piece for today! I can still decorate clothing though, or make non-boutique wearables.
message.noTailoring: You don't have enough creative energy left for tailoring clothing.
profession.description.0: Looms and Yarn Spinners have a 25% chance to produce extra output.
profession.description.1: Tailored boutique clothing can have quality. Higher sewing level increases chance for higher quality.
profession.description.2: Dyed cloth and yarn worth 20% more. 50% chance to not use up the dye after dyeing.
profession.description.3: Silkworm Racks produce 1 day faster. 30% chance for a Silkworm Rack to not consume Mulberry Leaves after producing.
profession.description.4: Shipping unique, varied combinations of boutique clothing increases sell price of every item for up to a week.
profession.description.5: Jeweled clothing grants one friendship heart when gifted and ignores the weekly gift limit.
profession.description.5.pre1616: Jeweled clothing grants one friendship heart when gifted.
power.couturier.name: Couturier Price Bonus
power.couturier.description: Global sell price bonus from at least one farmer having Couturier: +{{multiplier}}%
command.openCouturierChest: Open Couturier Shipped Item Chest (for debugging only)
